subject: Preakness Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: After a switch in jockeys by Bob Baffert, Lookin at Lucky’s trainer, Martin Garcia raced the horse to win the Preakness Stakes.
snippet: After a switch in jockeys by Bob Baffert, Lookin at Lucky’s trainer, Martin Garcia raced the horse to win the Preakness Stakes.
